title: Grand Opening: Experience an Eco-Luxe Escape in a Private Pool Villa
description: Let Escapes Club help you reconnect with nature at the eco-friendly Chinnar Eco Living resort - a brand new property located on a farm with a backdrop of striking mountains. Treat yourself to a getaway in a huge private pool villa and enjoy nightly four-course dinners for two and a daily set menu breakfast for two.

title: Heritage Karaikudi Family Escape with Chettinad Culinary Experiences
description:
Embark on a culinary adventure of authentic Chettinad flavours and old-world charm at Chidambara Vilas, a Chettiar palace that carefully preserves a 118-year-old legacy. Offering up an opulent feast for the senses and heritage design with soaring domes, glittering chandeliers and just 25 boutique rooms, this stunningly restored property near Karaikudi (just an eight-hour drive from Bengaluru) is the ultimate destination for a relaxing getaway.

Experience an escape imbued with cultural and historic significance as you venture to nearby temples and savour the pride of the region - decadent Chettinad cuisine crafted with unique local flavours and fresh produce.
offer_address: TSK House, Ramachandrapuram, Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu 622505, India

title: Majestic Ooty Palatial Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Dining Discount
description: Immerse yourself in royal grandeur at the historic WelcomHeritage Fernhills Royal Palace Ooty, a majestic sanctuary nestled in the heart of the Nilgiris. Once the summer haven of the Maharaja of Mysore, this Swiss chalet-inspired palace, set amidst tea gardens and cardamom plantations, offers an unparalleled luxury experience. Revel in the elegance of Burmese teak furnishings, dine on exquisite cuisine at Curry & Rice restaurant, or unwind in the library. Just a stone's throw from Ooty's iconic attractions, this regal retreat promises an unforgettable journey into opulence and tranquillity.
offer_address: Fernhill Post, Fernhill Udhagamandalam Tamilnadu India

title: Lavish Chettiar Mansion Escape with Daily Breakfast & Heritage Experiences
description:
Step back in time at Chidambara Vilas, a 120-year-old palatial mansion restored into a heritage hotel, just an hour's drive from Chennai. Boasting just 25 boutique rooms, Chidambara Vilas is your personal gateway to the culturally and historically rich Chettinad region of Tamil Nadu. A celebrity favourite, this ancient mansion showcases Chettiar architecture through antique furniture, glittering chandeliers, Belgium glass and traditional Athangudi tile work and paintings. It carries forward the legacy of the globally popular Chettinad cuisine - from traditional banana leaf meals to local recipes, the chefs curate a memorable experience through an interactive and experiential setup.

Apart from being close to the temple cities of Trichy, Madurai and Thanjavur, this painstakingly renovated heritage property by Sangam Group is an excellent example of Chettiar luxury with its grandiose opulence and warm Tamil hospitality. Experience an escape imbued with cultural and historical significance as Chidambara Vilas transports you to the golden era, reimagined with a contemporary touch.
offer_address: TSK House, Ramachandrapuram, Pudukkottai, Tamil Nadu 622505, India

title: Grand Opening: Gorgeous Ayatana Ooty Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & Nature Walk
description: Immerse yourself in the serene allure of the newly unveiled WelcomHeritage Ayatana Ooty, a secluded haven hidden within the verdant embrace of the mist-veiled Nilgiri Hills. This 20-acre estate, adorned with 30 tastefully crafted chalets, offers a captivating tableau of manicured tea gardens. A six-hour journey from Bengaluru unveils a glasshouse-inspired retreat, offering breathtaking valley vistas and a colonial allure with Toda-inspired interiors. Indulge in the infinity pool, nature walks, and gastronomic delights at Tycoons restaurant. Nestled in the heart of the 'Queen of the Hill Stations', this sanctuary is your gateway to explore the erstwhile colonial summer resort town of Ooty.
offer_address: Muttinad Village, Adigaratty Post, Adigaratty, Nilgiris, Tamil Nadu, 643003
